com.cornell.opencomm.rtpstreamer
Class ReceiverThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.cornell.opencomm.rtpstreamer.ReceiverThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ReceiverThread
extends Thread

ReceiverThread is a generic stream receiver. It receives packets from RTP and writes them into an OutputStream. Taken from/based on r473 of Sipdroid's RTPStreamReceiver class (sipdroid.org)
